name: WITH THOSE BELOW
description:
You play as an amateur spelunker planning to explore a newly found  cave system when everything goes wrong and you are left to survive in the depths. Find your way back to the surface by any means whilst everything is against you. 

Made for the Epic Mega Jam 2022 with the theme As Above So Below.

CONTROLS

  • WASD to Move
  • Mouse to Look Around 
  • Left Shift to Run
  • Left Ctrl or C to Crouch
  • F to use Flashlight
  • E to Interact
  • SPACEBAR to Jump
